attributes.action: Provide an extra Ambulance parking bay outside Royal London Hospital (Stepney Way)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Countless times NHS Trust and Private Ambulance services are unabled to drop off patients outside the Outpatient entrance due to limited space allocated in Stepney Way. I petition that one extra space is create to alleviate the problem of NHS Trust and Private Ambulance services from being issued parking tickets due to the lack of space that is currently allocated.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
